name: Cosmic Intruders - Amazing Cow
description:
Cosmic Intruders is a small Space Invaders clone made with a lot of love <3

It was made as a job test for Miniclip (Lisbon) by n2omatt! 

Cosmic Intruders is released as GPLv3 and its sources and assets can be found on Amazing Cow's github page!. Feel FREE to HACK and SHARE it!

We hope that you enjoy our little game!
